sales.name: Magaschoni
sales.description: There's a certain art to dressing for the office in the cold-weather months — when balancing style with comfort is a must — and our fashion-forward buyers are experts at walking the fine line (even in pumps). It all comes down to having the right all-weather pieces in your closet. Mix and match from this array of amazing essentials you can wear all year round: pencil skirts, silk blouses, cashmere shawls, knit dresses, and cozy cardigans.

sales.name: Fine Jewelry by Gregg Ruth & Michael Beaudry
sales.description: It's no secret that we have a soft spot for diamonds. . . and the ones on in this sale have us swooning. Pavé charm bracelets. Elegant drops. Three-sided pavé eternity bands. Extravagant hoops. Have your pick — all eyes will be on you no matter which piece you choose.

sales.name: Key Pieces for the Season
sales.description: From outerwear and suits to accessories and shoes — we've pulled together a comprehensive collection the stuff you need to have in your closet this winter. Stock up, and make sure your wardrobe passes muster.

sales.name: Australia Luxe
sales.description: Come rain or snow, it's hard to resist the allure and warmth of cozy sheepskin boots. The picks here — including tall classics and short lace-ups — also happen to be as fashion-forward as they are easy on your feet. Style tip: Tuck your favorite pair of skinny jeans inside the boots.

sales.name: Magaschoni
sales.description: There's a certain art to dressing for the office in the cold-weather months — when balancing style with comfort is a must — and our fashion-forward buyers are experts at walking the fine line (even in pumps). It all comes down to having the right all-weather pieces in your closet. Mix and match from this array of amazing essentials you can wear all year round: pencil skirts, silk blouses, cashmere shawls, knit dresses, and cozy cardigans.

sales.name: ACNE Jeans & Filippa K
sales.description: If Swedish style is your thing, you’ve come to the right place, because this sale features a host of uncomplicated, modern gear from two of Stockholm’s favorite brands. Whether you pick up a pair of Acne’s signature jeans, something from Filippa K’s expertly executed selection of tailored basics, or any of the other great stuff on offer, you can’t go wrong.

sales.name: L'Wren Scott
sales.description: Celebrity stylist, former model, and longtime girlfriend of Mick Jagger L’Wren Scott knows how to dress a woman: Keep it timeless, make the silhouette sexy, and never follow the trends. No wonder Angelina Jolie, Sarah Jessica Parker, Madonna, and Nicole Kidman are huge fans of the line. Standout pieces include a wool tuxedo trench, a lacquered tweed gown, and the sequined cardigans — but really, we love them all!

sales.name: ACNE Jeans & Filippa K
sales.description: If Swedish style is your thing, you’ve come to the right place, because this sale features a host of uncomplicated, modern gear from two of Stockholm’s favorite brands. Whether you pick up a pair of Acne’s signature jeans, something from Filippa K’s expertly executed selection of tailored basics, or any of the other great stuff on offer, you can’t go wrong.

sales.name: I'm Looking For: Industrial-Rustic Style
sales.description: The combination of wood and metal, steely and earthy hues, and clean, uncluttered design: those are elements to look for in building an industrial-rustic look. From kitchenware and serving pieces, to tabletop accessories and even rugs, we’ve put together a selection of pieces that effortlessly blend warmth and functionalism. The result will be a space that’s as livable as it is stylish.

sales.name: Desanto Italia Belts & Small Leather Goods
Hancock Gourmet
sales.description: Since 1946, the Hancock family boasted great dishes with fresh Maine lobster. First, at the restaurant founded by grandmother Hazel and now, granddaughter Cal Hancock keeps the family tradition alive at the Gourmet Lobster Company. Here, Cal creates award-winning seafood dishes that showcase her family's love for Maine’s finest shellfish.

sales.name: Helen Kaminski
sales.description: Handmade in Madagascar, Helen Kaminski’s bags are designed to evoke the natural beauty of Australia and its unspoiled natural landscapes. Today’s sale features the best of the brand’s luxe accessories, from roomy satchels to cool crossbodies, plus felt cloche hats, berets, and bucket hats.

sales.name: Red Carpet Evening Gowns
sales.description: Your invite to the Oscars may have gotten lost in the mail, but that doesn't mean you shouldn't have a red-carpet look at the ready. (One never knows!) This array of gorgeous gowns from the likes of Zac Posen and J. Mendel will have you looking Best-Dressed-List ready. Also on offer: crystal-encrusted jewelry and evening clutches in gorgeous exotic leather.

sales.name: Up to 70% Off: Bath Blowout
sales.description: Rejuvenate your powder room for spring with these plush bath essentials. First-rate materials (think Egyptian cotton) and timeless colors define the lot. Pick up an extra set, because you know those summer guests will start showing up early.

sales.name: Design Craft Lighting
sales.description: Design Craft’s lighting manages to be classically inspired yet completely fresh and out-of-the-ordinary. And this sale has a wide array of styles, from classic, slim-lined floor lamps to curvy, sculptural options. Sub-par lighting will drag down a room’s overall look — just as the wrong accessories will mar a great outfit. A few inspired picks from this lot will render your room perfectly finished and up to date.

sales.name: I'm Looking For: Industrial-Rustic Style
sales.description: The combination of wood and metal, steely and earthy hues, and clean, uncluttered design: those are elements to look for in building an industrial-rustic look. From kitchenware and serving pieces, to tabletop accessories and even rugs, we’ve put together a selection of pieces that effortlessly blend warmth and functionalism. The result will be a space that’s as livable as it is stylish.

sales.name: Set a Beautiful Table: Kim Seybert and Star Home
sales.description: A good meal becomes great when it’s served on a beautiful table. Make your table special with Star Home’s accessories; from two-tiered servers to all-purpose platters, these pieces are as beautiful as they are functional. Finish the look with Kim Seybert’s bold, multi-textured place mats, napkin rings, and chargers.

sales.name: Sam & Lavi
sales.description: Airy linen rompers. Lace button-ups. Curve-hugging black tank dresses. The duo behind Sam & Lavi have made a name for themselves by bringing together the best of California cool and New York chic, and their talents are on full display in this collection. Also on offer: shifts in pretty springtime hues, lightweight mesh tops, floral dresses, and more.

sales.name: Fine Jewelry by Gregg Ruth & Michael Beaudry
sales.description: It's no secret that we have a soft spot for diamonds. . . and the ones on in this sale have us swooning. Pavé charm bracelets. Elegant drops. Three-sided pavé eternity bands. Extravagant hoops. Have your pick — all eyes will be on you no matter which piece you choose.

sales.name: Redecorate for Spring! Furniture, Rugs, & Lighting Up to 50% Off
sales.description: It’s that time of year: Spring’s just around the corner, and if you’re anything like us, you can’t wait to throw open the windows and get some color and print in your world. These furnishings, rugs, and lighting options will help you do just that, with lots of cheery hues and extroverted patterns. There are plenty of classic, neutral pieces too, that’ll serve you for many seasons to come. Mix and match basic with bold, and classic with modern, for a perfectly curated "I-hired-a-decorator" look.

sales.name: BabyBjörn & UPPAbaby
sales.description: This sale is all about transporting your tot in the chicest, safest way possible. Cruise the streets with the UPPAbaby Vista stroller (which comes in a bunch of colors), or tote your little one in style with these soft-shelled BabyBjörn carriers. We have some other baby must-haves mixed in too, like potty seats and plate-and-spoon sets.

sales.name: L'Amour & Angel Shoes
sales.description: A shoe that's both stylish and comfortable is the holy grail of footwear, especially when it comes to dressing your little ones. With that in mind, we've pulled together a selection of fuss-free ballet flats, Mary Janes, sandals, and more from one of our favorite Southern brands. Sanity-saving pull-on fits and Velcro closures only add to the appeal.

sales.name: Handmade Furnishings feat. Central Station
sales.description: The natural grain, burls, and beauty of wood sit center stage in Paul Delaisse’s handmade furniture. The Belgian designer travels the world in search of distinctive lumber, and then crafts singular streamlined pieces from his finds. Take the Giacometti basic table, with its reclaimed-teak top and tapered legs. Or check out the ingenious Cargo lounge chair, featuring a steel frame, teak armrests, and khaki-colored upholstery made from recycled tent tarps. We've also added in some beautiful handmade rugs, in overdyed finishes and eye-catching patterns, which will make a perfect counterpoint.

sales.name: Shirt Shop
sales.description: A sharp shirt is a truly indispensable wardrobe item. But there isn't just one type of sharp shirt. You need something for the office, of course. But you also need a solid selection of off-the-clock options. In this massive sale, we’ve got you covered on all fronts.

sales.name: Harper Collins Children's Books
sales.description: Don’t be surprised if your little ones start asking for an early bedtime once they get a look at this selection of books. All of your tot’s favorite authors make an appearance, from Shel Silverstein to Fancy Nancy's Jane O'Connor.

sales.name: Handmade Furnishings feat. Central Station
sales.description: The natural grain, burls, and beauty of wood sit center stage in Paul Delaisse’s handmade furniture. The Belgian designer travels the world in search of distinctive lumber, and then crafts singular streamlined pieces from his finds. Take the Giacometti basic table, with its reclaimed-teak top and tapered legs. Or check out the ingenious Cargo lounge chair, featuring a steel frame, teak armrests, and khaki-colored upholstery made from recycled tent tarps. We've also added in some beautiful handmade rugs, in overdyed finishes and eye-catching patterns, which will make a perfect counterpoint.

sales.name: Sunday Night Steals
sales.description: It’s Sunday night. The weekend is nearly over. But don’t despair — we’ve got a selection of top-notch gear to bring a little bit of extra joy to your evening. Scoop up a steal now and start your week off right.

sales.name: Shirt Shop
sales.description: A sharp shirt is a truly indispensable wardrobe item. But there isn't just one type of sharp shirt. You need something for the office, of course. But you also need a solid selection of off-the-clock options. In this massive sale, we’ve got you covered on all fronts.

sales.name: Levels of Discovery Toddler Furniture
sales.description: Kids are naturally curious, and this furniture helps little ones experience the sheer delight of discovery. The brand, created by a father of three, is new to Gilt, and we've chosen some of our favorite items for this sale. The firefighter-themed revolving bookcase is adorable (it doesn't even look like a bookcase!), and we love the princess desk set, which has hidden compartments creative kids can seek out.

sales.name: Opening Ceremony, Nili Lotan & More
sales.description: Here at Gilt, there are some brands our staffers find themselves turning to again and again for their sophisticated, versatile silhouettes, impeccable tailoring, and luxe materials. And we've put them all together in one sale. Find standout pieces like timeless trenches and pea coats, daring brocade capes, perfect-fit skinny pants, and more from the likes of Gryphon, Nili Lotan, Opening Ceremony, and Helmut Lang.

sales.name: Up to 75% Off Frames & Vases
sales.description: Here, you’ll find the pieces that’ll perfectly finish off a room — namely, vases in a wide range of shapes, sizes, and colors (all with an extraordinarily artful bent). There are also frames, in exotic materials like natural bone and agate, that’ll capture your memories in high style.

sales.name: Get Organized!
sales.description: Good design and organization must go hand in hand; and, by picking just a few things from this selection of bins, cases, and baskets, you’ll go a long way to getting everything in its proper place. And Clos-ette’s slim-line hangers will make your closet seem a lot bigger.

sales.name: Sunday Night Steals
sales.description: It’s Sunday night. The weekend is nearly over. But don’t despair — we’ve got a selection of top-notch gear to bring a little bit of extra joy to your evening. Scoop up a steal now and start your week off right.

sales.name: Up to 75% Off Blankets & Throws
sales.description: These ultra-soft blankets and throws, in the finest materials like wool and cashmere, will get you through the rest of winter, then effortlessly transition into spring. There are plenty of neutrals, but just as many brighter hues and bold prints — mix and match a few for an effortlessly pulled-together look in the bedroom or on a sofa. And all come at deeper-than-ever discounts, up to 75% off.

sales.name: Haurex Watches
sales.description: Don't get us wrong — we're big fans of piling on the accessories. But for  days when we're keeping it minimal, nothing beats a bold timepiece. These quality, Italian-made watches are candy for your wrists. This sale features glam oversize options alongside more feminine picks — think lilac straps, blue dials, crystal accents, and more.

sales.name: Sunday Night Steals: Apparel & Accessories
sales.description: Want to score of-the-moment wintertime styles by some of your favorite designer names for less? This mix of essential separates, dresses, and accessories — by brands like Miguelina, ABS, Free People, Black Halo, and more — makes dressing for the cold weather simple.

sales.name: All About Wedges
sales.description: As you may have noticed, the wedge has officially made a comeback — in no small part because it delivers serious height without the discomfort of a high heel. This best-of-both-worlds shoe is more stylish than ever, at least when it comes to our array: From chunky neutrals in leather and suede to playful zippered options, you can wear these all day — and night — paired with all your favorite leg-baring skirts ensembles.

sales.name: Levels of Discovery Toddler Furniture
sales.description: Kids are naturally curious, and this furniture helps little ones experience the sheer delight of discovery. The brand, created by a father of three, is new to Gilt, and we've chosen some of our favorite items for this sale. The firefighter-themed revolving bookcase is adorable (it doesn't even look like a bookcase!), and we love the princess desk set, which has hidden compartments creative kids can seek out.

sales.name: Chelsea Flower, Love Sam & More
sales.description: Spring is just around the corner, and there's no better time to embrace your romantic side. Fanciful flourishes abound in this array: Look for rich details, luxe fabrics, and curve-grazing fits in the selection we've put together here. We're especially head-over-heels for the flowy, embellished blouses and the pretty floral dresses.

sales.name: Hancock Gourmet Lobster Rolls and more
Wardrobe Essentials: Everything You Need
sales.description: Meet the components of classic, versatile style: the little bright dress, the statement blouse, the clean jean, the transitional scarf, the transitional shoe, the diamond accent, the perfect sock, and the carryall.

sales.name: Top Gear: Maclaren, Phil & Teds & more
Coat Rack
sales.description: Staying warm doesn’t mean sacrificing style. Just take a look at this generous collection of jackets and coats, all fit to take the edge off the chill and look good doing it. Whatever your style, we’ve got the outerwear to match, so you better get moving. It’s cold out there.

sales.name: Softline Window Panels
sales.description: Put the finishing touch on a room with these elegant window panels. Create harmony in a space by choosing ones that complement or contrast with your wall paint and upholstery. One idea is a tonal look: if your walls are light blue, for example, let your curtains be just a shade deeper, creating visual depth. To make a space pop, choose curtains that feature a graphic pattern (you can never go wrong with bold stripes).

sales.name: Platinum Collection by SF Designs
sales.description: This boutique Chicago firm's furnishings are all about classic style and attention to detail. We’re taken with the tufted armchairs, chaises, sofas, benches, and headboards; they’re classics that’ll stand the test of time, and they come in pleasing hues and tailored proportions that are perfectly cut out for today. Finish the look with the storage ottomans and the armless wingbacks. And, if you’re looking to go bolder than a solid, check out the statement-making, boldly printed options.

sales.name: Color Me Neon: Our Brightest Brights!
Sesame Street Apparel & Books
sales.description: Who doesn't love Sesame Street? We've got all kinds of goodies featuring characters from the show, which has been on the air for more than 40 years. Our selection of T-shirts, vests, shirt-and-pants sets, dresses, and onesies will bring you right back to your childhood. Our favorite items: the oh-so-cute mittens and hats!

sales.name: Hunter Boot for Kids
sales.description: Just like the adult versions, Hunter Boot wellies for kids are rainy-day staples that mix function and style. The designs are scaled down perfectly for smaller feet and come in fun colors little ones love. This well-respected brand also makes outerwear, so keep your child cozy in the cool jackets we have here!

sales.name: Tea Collection Spring Apparel
sales.description: Keep your kids looking stylish with these perfect pairings from Tea Collection. Choose from everyday plaid hoodies and shorts for the boys, and casual striped dresses and tops for the girls. These comfy clothes are perfect for school and play!

sales.name: The Young Scientists Club & Uncle Milton
Crafty Kids
sales.description: Got a mini artist on your hands? We've got the perfect products for you, all designed to let imaginations run wild. This handpicked selection includes a stamp kit and chalkboard easels, plus creative wall art for your little one's room.

sales.name: Fine Jewelry Personal Shopping
sales.description:
Our Fine Jewelry Personal Shopping team is now available to offer one-on-one assistance in finding everything from classic investment pieces to one-of-a-kind designs not currently available on Gilt.com. To give you some idea of the kinds of gorgeous gems to which we have access, we’ve rounded up an amazing array of finds for your perusing pleasure, including multi-gem earrings, museum-worthy necklaces, and diamonds galore.

Looking for something you don’t see here? Contact our Personal Jewelry Shopping team at jewelryrequests@gilt.com or (855) 758-3765.

sales.name: Mia Bossi Diaper Bags
sales.description: Don't be deceived by the high-fashion look of these Italian diaper bags. On the inside of these cleverly designed satchels, you'll find changing pads, diaper pouches, and pockets galore for all the baby essentials you need. But that's your secret: The world only sees enviably chic bags rendered in luxe, supple leather and classic waxed canvas.

sales.name: The Basics Shop: Featuring Levi's Denim
sales.description: When it comes to building a great wardrobe, start with the basics. We've got a selection of go-to pieces here — from underwear and socks to shirts and dress shoes — that’ll set you on the road to a properly outfitted closet.
